item.title: Advert Attack Script!
item.dc:creator: @Sharkboy2222 Sharkboy2222
item.description:
@Sharkboy2222 wrote:

scarscript:
program advert;

procedure lv1;
begin
repeat
clickmouse(1090,658,true);
clickmouse(953,894,true);
clickmouse(1036,850,true);
clickmouse(874,744,true);
clickmouse(1025,830,true);
clickmouse(794,782,true);
sleep(20);
clickmouse(881,836,true);
clickmouse(1052,801,true);
clickmouse(792,885,true);
clickmouse(1022,802,true);
sleep(20);
clickmouse(847,817,true);
clickmouse(988,873,true);
clickmouse(709,886,true);
clickmouse(699,765,true);
wait(25);
until(getcolor(1090,658)=8);//run the script every time it goes the next round
end;

procedure restlvs;//means all the rest lvs after 1
begin
clickmouse(979,899,true);//to go to next round
wait(5);//change if too fast
repeat
clickmouse(1090,658,true);//to close the popups
until(getcolor(1090,658)=8);//remember,run script every time it goes to next round
end;

begin
repeat
lv1;
restlvs;
until(false)
end.

isnt working for me

Read full topic

item.title: Advert Attack Script!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[scar]////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// By:SSlleeaakkiinngg //
// Type:Advert Attack //
// This is my first script. //
// Please comment on this. //
// Hope you enjoy it! //
// //
// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program advert;

procedure lv1;
begin
repeat
clickmouse(1090,658,true);
clickmouse(953,894,true);
clickmouse(1036,850,true);
clickmouse(874,744,true);
clickmouse(1025,830,true);
clickmouse(794,782,true);
sleep(20);
clickmouse(881,836,true);
clickmouse(1052,801,true);
clickmouse(792,885,true);
clickmouse(1022,802,true);
sleep(20);
clickmouse(847,817,true);
clickmouse(988,873,true);
clickmouse(709,886,true);
clickmouse(699,765,true);
wait(25);
until(getcolor(1090,658)=8);//run the script every time it goes the next round
end;

procedure restlvs;//means all the rest lvs after 1
begin
clickmouse(979,899,true);//to go to next round
wait(5);//change if too fast
repeat
clickmouse(1090,658,true);//to close the popups
until(getcolor(1090,658)=8);//remember,run script every time it goes to next round
end;

begin
repeat
lv1;
restlvs;
until(false)
end.[/scar]Fixed

On your main loop, you didn’t tell it to do any procedures.

Read full topic

item.title: Advert Attack Script!
item.dc:creator: @sslleeaakkiinngg sslleeaakkiinngg
item.description:
@sslleeaakkiinngg wrote:

[scar]
program advert;

var x,y:integer;
procedure go;
begin
clickmouse(479,433,true);//to click the go’s
wait(150);
end;
procedure popups;
begin
clickmouse(505,352,true);//to close the popups
wait(150);
writeln(‘nopopups’);//just incase if it cant close popups
wait(150);
end;
begin
repeat
go;
popups;
clickmouse(551,541,true);//just incase if it cant send-score
until(getcolor(x,y)=16777215);//so it can send-score
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
